entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Snow. Blowing snow over exposed areas late this evening and overnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 40 gusting to 60 this evening. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 21 this evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow. Temperature falling to minus 23 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending in the afternoon then cloudy. Blowing snow over exposed areas. Local amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature falling to minus 23 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 29 in the morning and minus 38 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: Clearing in the evening. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 26. Wind chill near minus 41. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Thursday 16 February 2023
